+@name: So I'm a Spider, So What?

info.+content: So I'm a Spider, So What?
Да, я паук, и что же?

After a Japanese classroom was destroyed by a mysterious explosion all the students reincarnated as humans on a fantasy world except for a female student who had the lowest reputation on the classroom, she was reincarnated as a spider monster. Being the weakest monster on the dungeon she need to survive using all her human intellect and courage. (from manga)
"keep weaving your spider way" by Riko Azuna
"Ganbare! Kumoko-san no Theme" by Aoi Yuuki
TVアニメ「蜘蛛ですが、なにか？」公式サイト

So, I'm not in this one, am I?
So I'm Still a Spider, So What?
